name: 2nd Edition of International Nutrition Research Conference
content: Magnus Group has built on the incredible success and enthusiastic feedback from our previous conference, and we cordially invite you to attend the “2nd Edition of International Nutrition Research Conference” (NUTRI 2022), which will be held in Rome, Italy from June 15 to 16, 2022\. “From Evolution to Revolution: A Holistic Perspective on Nutrition's Frontier Novelties” will be the main theme of the conference. All researchers, scientists, academicians, dietitians, nutrition specialists and industrialists interested in presenting their research findings in the NUTRI 2022 event are cordially invited to attend this outstanding Conference. We expect a massive number of food and nutrition industry specialists to attend this outstanding conference and recognize the importance of this major educational event in promoting the position of experimentation and progress. This conference is expected to provide delegates with a plethora of networking and educational opportunities. It comprises timely Plenary talks, keynote sessions. Oral presentations, Sessions, Workshops/Symposia, Exhibitions, as well as interactive and informal interactions. This will be one of the year's most stunning events. Attendees will also have the opportunity to learn about products and services from exhibiting firms showing the latest and greatest trends and offerings in the fields of nutrition, and health.
